ygData.subject: RE: Dragoon Dirk
ygData.msgSnippet: Some bards swear by bronze, I myself find it much too heavy for very little xtra AC. Some bards just like the looks of it. Myself, I ll likely be in banded
ygData.messageBody:
Some bards swear by bronze, I myself find it much too heavy for very little
xtra AC.

Some bards just like the looks of it.

Myself, I'll likely be in banded until such time as I replace with
rubicite, or magical stuff.



> For example I asked if Bronze Armor stopped more damage then banded
> over and above the AC increase. (which is very modest compared to its
> weight.) Not one answer. This is a relevant Bard topic because we
> can't afford to put all our extra points into Strength and the
> decision to wear Bronze plate is a tough one. Any thoughts?
